name: Performapal Five-Rainbow Magician
description:
Pendulum Effect You cannot Pendulum Summon, except from the Extra Deck. This effect cannot be negated. Each player applies 1 of these effects based on the number of Set cards in their Spell & Trap Zones.
â— 0: All monsters they control cannot attack or activate their effects.
â— 4 or more: The ATK of all monsters they control become double their original ATK. Monster Effect If either player Sets a Spell/Trap on your field while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
